trans-unit.source: [optional] The filename of the icon to be display in the tray.

seg-source.mrk: The filename of the icon to be display in the tray.

target.mrk: The filename of the icon to be display in the tray.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Icon identifier if the file contains multiple icons.

seg-source.mrk: Icon identifier if the file contains multiple icons.

target.mrk: Icon identifier if the file contains multiple icons.

trans-unit.source: To reset the icon to the default, use the function with no parameters TraySetIcon().

seg-source.mrk: To reset the icon to the default, use the function with no parameters TraySetIcon().

target.mrk: To reset the icon to the default, use the function with no parameters TraySetIcon().

trans-unit.source: Passing a positive number will reference the string equivalent icon name.

seg-source.mrk: Passing a positive number will reference the string equivalent icon name.

target.mrk: Passing a positive number will reference the string equivalent icon name.

trans-unit.source: Passing a negative number causes 1-based "index" behaviour. Some Dll can have icon extracted just with negative numbers.

seg-source.mrk: Passing a negative number causes 1-based "index" behaviour.
Some Dll can have icon extracted just with negative numbers.

target.mrk: Passing a negative number causes 1-based "index" behaviour.
Some Dll can have icon extracted just with negative numbers.

trans-unit.source: The filename parameter can be set to "blank", "info", "question", "stop" or "warning" to select some corresponding standard icon.

seg-source.mrk: The filename parameter can be set to "blank", "info", "question", "stop" or "warning" to select some corresponding standard icon.

target.mrk: The filename parameter can be set to "blank", "info", "question", "stop" or "warning" to select some corresponding standard icon.

trans-unit.source: The default tray menu items will not be shown and items are not checked when selected. These are options 1 and 2 for TrayMenuMode.

seg-source.mrk: The default tray menu items will not be shown and items are not checked when selected.
These are options 1 and 2 for TrayMenuMode.

target.mrk: The default tray menu items will not be shown and items are not checked when selected.
These are options 1 and 2 for TrayMenuMode.

trans-unit.source: Begin the timer and store the handle in a variable.

seg-source.mrk: Begin the timer and store the handle in a variable.

target.mrk: Begin the timer and store the handle in a variable.

trans-unit.source: Find the difference in time from the previous call of TimerInit

seg-source.mrk: Find the difference in time from the previous call of TimerInit

target.mrk: Find the difference in time from the previous call of TimerInit

trans-unit.source: If the difference is greater than 1 second then change the tray menu icon.

seg-source.mrk: If the difference is greater than 1 second then change the tray menu icon.

target.mrk: If the difference is greater than 1 second then change the tray menu icon.

trans-unit.source: Use a negative number for ordinal numbering.

seg-source.mrk: Use a negative number for ordinal numbering.

target.mrk: Use a negative number for ordinal numbering.

trans-unit.source: Set the tray menu tooltip with information about the icon index.

seg-source.mrk: Set the tray menu tooltip with information about the icon index.

target.mrk: Set the tray menu tooltip with information about the icon index.

trans-unit.source: Set the tray menu icon using the shell32.dll and the random index number.

seg-source.mrk: Set the tray menu icon using the shell32.dll and the random index number.

target.mrk: Set the tray menu icon using the shell32.dll and the random index number.
